Open Courts.Name: South Bellevue Community Center
Open Courts.Description: A community center with a gym, Basketball courts, climbing wall, and much more! Made in Partnership with the Boys & Girls Clubs of Bellevue.

Open Courts.Name: Redmond Commuinty & Senior Center
Open Courts.Description: A 52K square foot space that was designed for everyone. Contains several courts and is a great place for socialization!

Open Courts.Name: Crossroads Community Center
Open Courts.Description: An international welcoming place for all to build valuable relationships. Lots of programs such as arts, theater, and wellness.

Open Courts.Name: Hidden Valley Field House
Open Courts.Description: Offers recreational facilities for youth and their families on the Eastside.

Open Courts.Name: Mercer Island Community & Event Center
Open Courts.Description: Community center with many meeting rooms, and event spaces, a gym, and even a basketball court!

Open Courts.Name: Issaquah Community Center
Open Courts.Description: The Community Center is a gathering place for people of all ages with active lifestyles.
